title: Your Personal Fitness Trainer
hero_h1: Become the Best Version of Yourself
hero_p: Personal training, injury recovery, postnatal workouts, and unique SUP sessions in Sumy.
about_text: I am a certified fitness trainer with years of experience in sports, including field hockey. I specialize in functional training, knee and foot rehabilitation, postnatal training for mothers, as well as unique water practices like SUP yoga and SUP handball. My mission is to help you unlock your potential and find a balance between physical strength and mental well-being.

services.title: Personal Training
services.text: Individual sessions tailored to your goals and fitness level.

services.title: Knee and Foot Recovery
services.text: Expert rehabilitation and injury prevention protocols for the musculoskeletal system.

services.title: Training for Mothers
services.text: Safe postnatal programs to help you regain shape quickly.

services.title: SUP Fitness & Yoga
services.text: Workouts on SUP boards to improve balance, strength, and mood.
